No, that's the "racist morons don't want diverse skin shades in their children's schools" case. The one you're thinking of is the Scopes Monkey Trial, as famously portrayed in the film *Inherit the Wind*.

Incidentally, the pro-science side lost that case. And the descendants of the pro-gibberish side are still writing a lot of U.S. high school textbooks.

BTW, worth a read for anyone interested in the present-day iterations of this nonsense: the judgement from Dover vs Kitzmiller.
